attributes.action: Have a referendum to decide if Nicola Sturgeon should be the Queen of the UK
attributes.additional_details: Nicola Sturgeon is the best person in the whole United Kingdom and Northern Ireland and deserves to be Queen of it
attributes.background: have a referendum to decide if Nicola Sturgeon should be Queen of the UK and Northern Ireland

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Nicola Sturgeon to be made the Queen of the United Kingdom.
